Author: jl777c#5810
Content: make sure the dust payment sent to your old address has 'S' in the explorer for your old address. if not, that means you did not send it to the new address. send all funds to the new address to solve this

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if you did not get the early refund, that means you missed the cutoff yesterday, or made multiple claims or your address is contested or it is over 7777 KMD

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: plz do not be making DM asking about these things. it is always the same answer.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content:
there will be daily batches
make sure the dust payment sent to your old address has 'S' in the explorer for your old address. if not, that means you did not send it to the new address. send all funds to the new address to solve this
if you did not get the early refund, that means you missed the cutoff yesterday, or made multiple claims or your address is contested or it is over 7777 KMD

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: also, PLEASE DO NOT DM ME for support issues. support creates the claim data that i get. i dont create the claims data

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if you did not get a refund and you did everything you were supposed to, please contact support and not me

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i cannot help you

Content:
Hello, Admin... I downloaded the entire ocean qt wallet (took a looong time), I filled out the form and did receive a small transaction to my old agama address.  I had closed the ocean qt wallet. And now every time I try to open the ocean qt wallet I get an error. It reads “...thread ‘<unnamed>’ panicked at couldn’t finish reading Sprout groth16 at parameter file: 0s { code: 5, kind: Other, message: “Input/output error” } , libcore/result.rs:945:5
Note: Run with ‘RUST_BACKTRACE=1’ for a backtrace.
Abort trap: 6 
Logout 
...

The oceanqt address that I can’t open anymore is the address that I indicated on my form!  I’ve tried to restart my cpu many times but still get this error.  Should I download the Verus wallet(agama-macOS-v0.6.0-13-PBaaS-Cross-chain-Technology-Preview.dmg)?, and if so do I need to submit another form with my new Verus address, or can I just send a small transaction from the tiny funds that were sent to my agama address?  (Argh this is very frustrating!!) any assistance would be much appreciated
